title: Misto Esporte Clube
text:
Misto Esporte Clube, commonly known as Misto, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> team based in <a href="Tr%C3%AAs%20Lagoas">Três Lagoas</a>, <a href="Mato%20Grosso%20do%20Sul">Mato Grosso do Sul state</a>. They competed in the <a href="Copa%20do%20Brasil">Copa do Brasil</a> once.
History.
The club was founded on January 1, 1992. They competed in the <a href="Copa%20do%20Brasil">Copa do Brasil</a> in <a href="2009%20Copa%20do%20Brasil">2009</a>, defeating <a href="Campinense%20Clube">Campinense</a> in the First Round, but they were eliminated by <a href="Sport%20Club%20Corinthians%20Paulista">Corinthians</a> in the Second Round of the cup.
Stadium.
Misto Esporte Clube play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Benedito%20Soares%20Mota">Estádio Benedito Soares Mota</a>, nicknamed "Madrugadão". The stadium has a maximum capacity of 6,000 people.
